5F7.SI.summary: Wilton Resources Corporation Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the exploration, mining, and production of gold ores in Indonesia. It holds interest in the Ciemas gold project covering a total area of 3,078.5 hectares located in West Java Province of Indonesia. The company is also involved in general trading, transportation, construction, real estate, logging, farming, plantation, forestry, electrical, mechanical, computer, workshop, and printing and services businesses. Wilton Resources Corporation Limited is based in Singapore.

5TP.SI.summary: CNMC Goldmine Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the exploration, development, mining, and marketing of gold in Malaysia. The company also explores for silver, iron, feldspar, lead, and zinc deposits. Its flagship project is the Sokor Gold Field project, which covers an area of 2,370 acres located in the district of Tanah Merah, Kelantan. The company also processes mined ores into gold ores; and provides drilling and non-mining related services, as well as offers underground mining services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Singapore.

A78.SI.summary: Shen Yao Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the exploration and mining of gold deposits. It holds interests in the Castlemaine Goldfields covering an area of approximately 350 square kilometers in Victoria, Australia. The company was formerly known as LionGold Corp Ltd and changed its name to Shen Yao Holdings Limited in December 2020. Shen Yao Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Singapore.
